courseDetails.title: Mutig verhandeln: Erfolgreiche Gehalts- & Vertragsgespräche!
courseDetails.shortDescription: Dein Weg zur Verhandlungsstärke: Erfahre, wie du mutig Gehalts- und Vertragsgespräche meisterst!
courseDetails.longDescription:
Gesamte Kursdauer:  ca. 4 Stunden ( 150 Minuten Theorie + 90 Minuten Praxisübungen)

_______________________________________________________________________________

ÜBERWINDE DEINE VERHANDLUNGSÄNGSTE:


Manchmal fühlen sich Menschen unsicher, wenn es darum geht, ihre Gehaltsvorstellungen deutlich zu kommunizieren. Oder vielleicht zögern sie, wenn es darum geht, bessere Vertragsbedingungen auszuhandeln. Diese Gefühle sind vielen bekannt, wenn es um Gehalts- und Vertragsverhandlungen geht.

Aber weißt du was? Es ist absolut in Ordnung, diese Ängste zu haben. Viele von uns haben sie schon einmal gespürt. Doch jetzt ist es an der Zeit, diese Ängste zu überwinden und die Verhandlungsfähigkeiten auf ein neues Level zu heben!

Es geht nicht nur darum, Verhandlungstechniken zu erlernen, sondern auch darum, Selbstvertrauen aufzubauen und die eigenen Stärken zu erkennen. Der Fokus liegt darauf, mutig aufzutreten und Gehalts- und Vertragsverhandlungen souverän zu meistern. Es bedarf dazu praktische Strategien und Werkzeuge, um die Verhandlungskompetenz zu stärken und die nötige Sicherheit für erfolgreiche Verhandlungen zu gewinnen.

_______________________________________________________________________________

WAS DICH IN DIESEM KURS ERWARTET:


Im Kurs "Mutig Verhandeln: Gehalt & Verträge" erwartet dich eine umfassende Einführung in die Welt der Verhandlungen. Du lernst die Grundlagen und Definitionen von Verhandlungen kennen und erfährst, warum Mut in Verhandlungen entscheidend ist. Deine Dozentin Susanne wird mit dir verschiedene Verhandlungstechniken und -strategien besprechen sowie die Verhandlungspsychologie und emotionale Intelligenz behandeln. Besonders wichtig ist die Verhandlungsführung in schwierigen Situationen. Zudem geht es darum die Erfolgsfaktoren im Verhandeln zu betrachten, darunter die verschiedenen Verhandlungsstile, den Aufbau von Vertrauensbeziehungen und die Abschluss- und Follow-up-Fähigkeiten.  Am Ende wirst du lernen, einen individuellen Verhandlungsplan zu entwickeln, der auf deine Ziele und Prioritäten abgestimmt ist.

Dieser Kurs bietet dir eine praxisnahe Anleitung, um deine Verhandlungskompetenz zu stärken und erfolgreich in Gehalts- und Vertragsverhandlungen zu bestehen. Sei bereit für neue Herausforderungen und steigere deine Verhandlungsfähigkeiten!


Hinweis: Dieser Kurs ist im HIL-Format erstellt (HIL = High Intensity Learning) - Ziel ist es hierbei in kurzer Zeit die am Lernprozess beteiligten Hirnareale maximal zu beanspruchen, um somit Wissen intensiv in kürzester Zeit aufzunehmen und zu verarbeiten.

_______________________________________________________________________________

#Verhandlungskompetenz #Gehaltsverhandlungen #Vertragsverhandlungen  #Karriereentwicklung
targetAudiences: Der Kurs richtet sich an alle, die ihre Verhandlungsfähigkeiten verbessern möchten, insbesondere wenn es um Gehaltsverhandlungen und Verträge geht, und bietet praxisnahe Strategien und Werkzeuge, um selbstbewusst und effektiv in finanziellen Verhandlungen aufzutreten. Wenn du nach Möglichkeiten suchst, mutig und erfolgreich in Verhandlungen um Gehalt und Verträge zu sein, ist dieser Kurs genau das richtige für dich.

courseDetails.title: English Academic Vocabulary Professional Certification AVPC
courseDetails.shortDescription: Professional Certification AVPC by MTF Institute
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to course: English Academic Vocabulary Professional Certification AVPC by MTF Institute


Expanding academic vocabulary is crucial for efficiently achieving high results in both the degree learning and the career. Here are several reasons why:


Effective Communication:

A rich academic vocabulary enhances your ability to express ideas clearly and precisely. This is particularly important in academic settings where conveying complex concepts and theories requires a nuanced and diverse vocabulary.


Academic Success:

In degree learning, academic vocabulary is often directly linked to comprehension and performance. Understanding and using specialized terminology relevant to your field of study can significantly contribute to success in exams, research papers, and other academic tasks.


Critical Thinking:

A robust academic vocabulary is essential for critical thinking. It allows you to analyze information, make connections, and form well-reasoned arguments. The ability to articulate thoughts effectively is closely tied to cognitive skills, which are indispensable for academic and professional success.


Professional Advancement:

As you transition into your career, possessing an extensive academic vocabulary becomes even more valuable. Effective communication in the workplace, whether in written reports, presentations, or discussions, requires a command of specialized language relevant to your field.


Networking and Collaboration:

In professional settings, effective collaboration often hinges on clear communication. A broad academic vocabulary facilitates meaningful conversations with colleagues, clients, and stakeholders. It enables you to contribute meaningfully to discussions and work collaboratively on projects.


Confidence in Expressing Ideas:

A rich vocabulary provides you with the confidence to express your thoughts and ideas persuasively. This is beneficial not only in academic environments but also in professional situations where effective communication can make a significant impact.


Continuous Learning:

Academic vocabulary is not static; it evolves with advancements in knowledge and changes in your field. Constantly expanding your vocabulary ensures that you remain adaptable and can engage with new ideas and concepts throughout your academic and professional journey.


In summary, extending your academic vocabulary is not just a linguistic skill; it is a key element in achieving excellence in both academic pursuits and professional endeavors. It fosters effective communication, critical thinking, and the ability to navigate and contribute meaningfully to complex academic and professional landscapes.

Entrepreneurship is the process of identifying opportunities, innovating, and taking risks to create and manage a business venture. It involves the willingness to bear uncertainty and the capacity to adapt to changing circumstances in order to achieve success. Entrepreneurs are individuals who embark on this journey, utilizing their creativity, vision, and determination to bring their ideas to life.

There are several main reasons why individuals choose to become entrepreneurs and build their own businesses:

  1. Pursuit of Passion: Many entrepreneurs are driven by a passion for a particular idea, product, or service. They want to bring their vision to fruition and make a meaningful impact in their chosen field.

  2. Financial Independence: Building a successful business can provide financial freedom and independence. Entrepreneurs have the opportunity to create wealth for themselves and their families by capitalizing on their own ideas and hard work.

  3. Flexibility and Autonomy: Entrepreneurship offers the flexibility to set one's own schedule and work on projects that align with personal values and goals. Entrepreneurs have the autonomy to make decisions and shape the direction of their businesses as they see fit.

  4. Desire for Innovation: Entrepreneurship is often driven by a desire to innovate and create something new. Entrepreneurs seek to solve problems, disrupt industries, and introduce novel solutions that improve people's lives.

  5. Personal Growth and Fulfillment: Building a business can be a deeply rewarding experience that fosters personal growth and fulfillment. Entrepreneurs face challenges, overcome obstacles, and learn valuable lessons along the way, which can lead to a sense of accomplishment and fulfillment.

Learning about business can provide essential knowledge and skills that support the process of building a career and launching a startup. Some ways in which learning about business can be beneficial include:

  1. Understanding Market Dynamics: A solid understanding of business principles can help entrepreneurs identify market opportunities, assess demand for their products or services, and develop effective strategies for reaching their target audience.

  2. Financial Management: Learning about finance and accounting is crucial for managing the financial aspects of a business, including budgeting, forecasting, and managing cash flow. This knowledge is essential for making informed decisions and ensuring the financial health of a startup.

  3. Marketing and Sales: Effective marketing and sales strategies are essential for attracting customers and growing a business. Learning about marketing principles, branding, and customer acquisition can help entrepreneurs develop strategies to effectively promote their products or services and drive sales.

  4. Leadership and Management: Learning about leadership and management principles can help entrepreneurs build and lead high-performing teams, delegate tasks effectively, and create a positive work culture within their organizations.

Overall, learning about business can provide entrepreneurs with the knowledge, skills, and confidence they need to navigate the challenges of entrepreneurship, build successful businesses, and achieve their goals.
targetAudiences: No special requirements. A course for anyone who wants to build their own business or become an entrepreneur

courseDetails.title: Programming Network Applications in Java
courseDetails.shortDescription: TCP and UDP sockets in Java
courseDetails.longDescription:
If you have a great idea for an app that needs to communicate through a network, or you're just beginning to learn Java, or you're a network engineer looking to implement one of many network protocols, you've come to the right place!

In this course, you'll get the tools to build both client-server and peer-to-peer applications. We'll cover both the use of TCP and UDP sockets, and I'll leave it to you to choose which one suits your application better. There are some bonus examples that you can use to practice, and you're more than welcome to post your questions, ideas or struggles in the Q&A section.

All of the code is thoroughly explained, so you don't need much prior Java knowledge, but basic understanding of programming in general is a plus.

Generally, network applications differ from non-network applications in their distributed nature, reliance on network protocols, client-server architecture, handling of network-related challenges, and utilization of web-based technologies. The networking aspect of these applications opens up opportunities for collaboration, remote access, and resource sharing, making them essential in today's interconnected world - which is why we'll learn about them in this course!


All feedback is welcome, so I encourage you to suggest ways to improve this course, but also criticize where needed. :) Hope you find it useful & learn something important here!
targetAudiences: Network engineers
Java beginners

courseDetails.title: Mastering Microsoft Azure Fundamentals (AZ-900) + Free Lab
courseDetails.shortDescription: Gain the Knowledge and Skills You Need to Succeed in Cloud Computing and Pass the AZ-900 Exam
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to the Microsoft Azure Fundamentals (AZ-900) course, designed to prepare you for the AZ-900 exam and provide you with a fundamental understanding of cloud computing and Microsoft Azure.

Cloud computing has become an essential part of modern-day technology, and Microsoft Azure is one of the leading cloud computing platforms that offer a wide range of services, including computing, storage, networking, and security. The AZ-900 certification is an introductory level certification offered by Microsoft, and this course covers all the essential concepts and topics that you need to know to pass the exam and gain a solid understanding of Microsoft Azure.

In this comprehensive course, you will learn the basics of cloud computing and Microsoft Azure, including the fundamentals of cloud computing, core Azure services, Azure pricing and support, security, privacy, compliance, and trust, and Azure management tools. You will also learn how to create and manage Azure resources using the Azure Portal, Azure PowerShell, and Azure CLI.

This course is designed to cater to the needs of different types of learners, including business stakeholders, IT professionals, students, and anyone who is interested in understanding cloud computing and its benefits. The course is divided into different sections, and each section covers a specific topic with detailed explanations, examples, and hands-on demonstrations.

Here is what you will learn in this course:

  • Understanding cloud computing and the benefits of using Microsoft Azure

  • Exploring Azure pricing, support, and service level agreements (SLAs)

  • Understanding Azure security, privacy, compliance, and trust

  • Managing Azure subscriptions, resources, and resource groups

  • Creating and managing Azure virtual machines, storage accounts, and virtual networks

  • Exploring Azure services such as Azure App Service, Azure Functions, and Azure SQL Database

  • Understanding Azure identity and access management (IAM) and Azure Active Directory (AD)

  • Exploring Azure management tools such as Azure PowerShell, Azure CLI, and Azure Portal

  • Preparing for the AZ-900 exam and earning your Microsoft Azure Fundamentals certification.

By the end of this course, you will have a deep understanding of Microsoft Azure and cloud computing, as well as the skills needed to manage and deploy Azure resources for your organization. You'll also be well-prepared to take and pass the AZ-900 exam, earning a valuable certification that can help you advance your career in cloud computing.

So, what are you waiting for? Enroll now in the Microsoft Azure Fundamentals (AZ-900) course and start your journey to becoming a Microsoft Azure expert!
targetAudiences: Individuals who are new to cloud computing and Microsoft Azure, including business stakeholders, IT professionals, students.
Anyone who is interested in understanding cloud computing and its benefits.

courseDetails.title: Empathy in Product Management
courseDetails.shortDescription: Mastering Product Success through Understanding Customer Needs and Team Collaboration
courseDetails.longDescription:
In this course, you will delve into various aspects of product management, guided by the core principle of empathy. You will learn how to understand and empathize with your customers, enabling you to uncover their needs, aspirations, and pain points. Through real-world case studies, you will master user research techniques, including designing studies, analyzing data, and extracting valuable insights to inform product decisions effectively.

Moreover, you will explore how to apply empathetic principles to product design and development. You will discover how to create user personas, and empathy maps, and conduct user testing to ensure that your products resonate with your target audience and deliver exceptional user experiences.

In addition to focusing on customer empathy, this course emphasizes the importance of fostering a culture of empathy within your teams and engaging stakeholders with empathy-driven communication. You will learn strategies for promoting open dialogue, constructive feedback, and collaboration, thereby cultivating an environment conducive to innovation and product success.

Furthermore, this course will guide you on leveraging empathy insights for continuous improvement. You will discover how to track key product success metrics, correlate them with empathy metrics, and use these insights to iterate and enhance your products iteratively.


Who is this course for?


  • Aspiring Product Managers seeking to kickstart their career in product management.

  • Current Product Managers aiming to deepen their knowledge and refine their skills.

  • Team Leaders and Managers interested in fostering empathy within their teams and driving collaboration.

  • Entrepreneurs and Startup Founders looking to build user-centric products and achieve business growth.

  • Anyone interested in product development and user experience, regardless of their background or experience level.


By the end of this course, you will emerge as a proficient and empathetic product manager, equipped with the tools and techniques to create successful products that resonate with your customers and drive business success. Join us to learn about empathy in product management and discover your skills in making new products."
targetAudiences: Aspiring Product Managers: Individuals who are interested in pursuing a career in product management and want to gain a comprehensive understanding of the role, including the importance of empathy in product development.

Current Product Managers: Professionals already working in product management roles who aim to deepen their knowledge and refine their skills, particularly in areas such as user research, product design, and stakeholder engagement.
Team Leaders and Managers: Leaders who oversee product development teams and are keen on fostering a culture of empathy within their teams to drive collaboration, innovation, and product success.

Entrepreneurs and Startup Founders: Individuals launching or managing startups who recognize the critical role of empathy in understanding customer needs, building user-centric products, and achieving business growth.

Anyone Interested in Product Development: Individuals from diverse backgrounds who have an interest in product development, user experience, or customer-centric approaches and wish to broaden their understanding of empathy-driven product management principles.

Entrepreneurship is the process of identifying opportunities, innovating, and taking risks to create and manage a business venture. It involves the willingness to bear uncertainty and the capacity to adapt to changing circumstances in order to achieve success. Entrepreneurs are individuals who embark on this journey, utilizing their creativity, vision, and determination to bring their ideas to life.

There are several main reasons why individuals choose to become entrepreneurs and build their own businesses:

  1. Pursuit of Passion: Many entrepreneurs are driven by a passion for a particular idea, product, or service. They want to bring their vision to fruition and make a meaningful impact in their chosen field.

  2. Financial Independence: Building a successful business can provide financial freedom and independence. Entrepreneurs have the opportunity to create wealth for themselves and their families by capitalizing on their own ideas and hard work.

  3. Flexibility and Autonomy: Entrepreneurship offers the flexibility to set one's own schedule and work on projects that align with personal values and goals. Entrepreneurs have the autonomy to make decisions and shape the direction of their businesses as they see fit.

  4. Desire for Innovation: Entrepreneurship is often driven by a desire to innovate and create something new. Entrepreneurs seek to solve problems, disrupt industries, and introduce novel solutions that improve people's lives.

  5. Personal Growth and Fulfillment: Building a business can be a deeply rewarding experience that fosters personal growth and fulfillment. Entrepreneurs face challenges, overcome obstacles, and learn valuable lessons along the way, which can lead to a sense of accomplishment and fulfillment.

Learning about business can provide essential knowledge and skills that support the process of building a career and launching a startup. Some ways in which learning about business can be beneficial include:

  1. Understanding Market Dynamics: A solid understanding of business principles can help entrepreneurs identify market opportunities, assess demand for their products or services, and develop effective strategies for reaching their target audience.

  2. Financial Management: Learning about finance and accounting is crucial for managing the financial aspects of a business, including budgeting, forecasting, and managing cash flow. This knowledge is essential for making informed decisions and ensuring the financial health of a startup.

  3. Marketing and Sales: Effective marketing and sales strategies are essential for attracting customers and growing a business. Learning about marketing principles, branding, and customer acquisition can help entrepreneurs develop strategies to effectively promote their products or services and drive sales.

  4. Leadership and Management: Learning about leadership and management principles can help entrepreneurs build and lead high-performing teams, delegate tasks effectively, and create a positive work culture within their organizations.

Overall, learning about business can provide entrepreneurs with the knowledge, skills, and confidence they need to navigate the challenges of entrepreneurship, build successful businesses, and achieve their goals.
targetAudiences: No special requirements. A course for anyone who wants to build their own business or become an entrepreneur

courseDetails.title: Adobe Illustrator Course for Graphics Design
courseDetails.shortDescription: Master the Art of Visual Expression: Unleash Your Creativity with Adobe Illustrator
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to the Adobe Illustrator Masterclass! This comprehensive course is designed to equip you with the essential skills and knowledge needed to become a proficient graphic designer using Adobe Illustrator.

Whether you're a beginner or have some experience with the software, this course will take you on a transformative journey, from the fundamentals to advanced techniques. You'll gain a solid understanding of Illustrator's powerful tools and features while learning how to create stunning visual designs for various purposes, such as branding, marketing materials, illustrations, and more.

Through a combination of theoretical explanations, hands-on exercises, and practical projects, you'll build a strong foundation in vector graphics creation. You'll learn how to navigate the Illustrator interface, manipulate shapes, lines, and colors, work with typography, and apply advanced techniques like masking, blending, and effects.

Key Course Features:

  1. Master the Illustrator Interface: Discover the ins and outs of the Illustrator workspace, tools, and panels, and learn how to customize them to suit your workflow.

  2. Shape and Object Manipulation: Explore the power of vector graphics by mastering shape creation, transformation, alignment, and precise object manipulation.

  3. Color and Gradient Mastery: Dive into the world of color theory, learn how to create and apply swatches, gradients, and patterns to bring life to your designs.

  4. Typography Techniques: Enhance your design with captivating typography by exploring font selection, text manipulation, and creative typographic effects.

  5. Advanced Techniques: Unlock the full potential of Illustrator by mastering advanced techniques like masking, blending, effects, and working with layers.

  6. Project-Based Learning: Apply your knowledge and skills to real-world projects, including logo design, poster creation, packaging design, and more.

  7. Tips and Tricks: Discover time-saving shortcuts, productivity hacks, and professional workflows to streamline your design process.

By the end of this course, you'll have the confidence and expertise to create professional-grade graphic designs using Adobe Illustrator. Whether you aspire to become a graphic designer, freelance illustrator, or simply want to enhance your creative skills, this course is your gateway to mastering Illustrator and unleashing your graphic design potential.

Enroll now and embark on your creative journey with Adobe Illustrator!
targetAudiences: Beginner who want to learn Adobe Illustrator
